article_metadata.description: The American dream has been, and still is, under attack. It is three pronged: making more of the population dependent on government aid, reducing the relevance and reputation of the United States around the globe, and weakening intermediary societies. The attack will continue to enjoy success because President Obama’s administration [...]
article_metadata.author: Alejandro Chafuen
